Director-General briefs on reporting lines of proposed new structure, aimed to make FAO more flexible and efficient Link: /director-general/news/news-article/en/c/1295751/

Director-General QU Dongyu briefed today permanent representatives of FAO member countries on the new reporting lines that go with his proposed changes to the organizational structure, aimed at creating an FAO that is fit-for-purpose, flexible, responsive, innovative and results-oriented.
